code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Typography,List,ListItem,ListItemText,Box,Container,Button,TextField}from'@mui/material';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const StockMonitoring=()=>{const[stocks,setStocks]=useState([]);const[newStockSymbol,setNewStockSymbol]=useState('');const[newStockName,setNewStockName]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const fetchStocks=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('/api/');setStocks(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Fetch stocks error:',error);}};fetchStocks();},[]);const addStock=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.post('/api/add/',{symbol:newStockSymbol,name:newStockName});setStocks([...stocks,response.data]);setNewStockSymbol('');setNewStockName('');}catch(error){console.error('Add stock error:',error);}};const deleteStock=async id=>{try{await axios.delete("/api/delete/".concat(id));setStocks(stocks.filter(stock=>stock.id!==id));}catch(error){console.error('Delete stock error:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{maxWidth:"md",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{marginTop:4,textAlign:'center'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",gutterBottom:true,children:"Stock Monitoring Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(List,{children:stocks.map(stock=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ListItem,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ListItemText,{primary:stock.name,secondary:stock.symbol}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"secondary",onClick:()=>deleteStock(stock.id),children:"Delete"})]},stock.id))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"New Stock Symbol",value:newStockSymbol,onChange:e=>setNewStockSymbol(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{label:"New Stock Name",type:"newStockName",value:newStockName,onChange:e=>setNewStockName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",onClick:addStock,children:"Add Stock"})]})})});};export default StockMonitoring;
